title: Did Sinbad play the fairy in Shazam in the 1990's?
subtitle: Although many viewers claim that they clearly remember playing comedian Sinbad elf in a film called Shazam, these memories seem to be another example of "the effect of mandela."
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The movie "Shazaam" of the 1990s is a comedian star Sinbad as a genie.
